member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Transport.GameTransportConfig
member.summary: Base configuration for game transport. Does not bind to a specific networking stack (LiteNetLib to be wired later).

member.summary: UDP port for the game server.

member.summary: Interval (in ticks) between full snapshots (server â†’ client).

member.summary: Target broadcast tick rate (Hz).

member.summary: Protocol version expected by this server/client.

member.summary: Helper methods for serializing and sending game transport messages.

member.summary: Delegate for handling messages received from the server.

member.summary: Abstraction for a game client transport (e.g., LiteNetLib client).

member.summary: Drop probability (0-1).

member.summary: Delay probability (0-1).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Transport.TransportFuzzOptions.MaxDelayMs
member.summary: Maximum artificial delay in milliseconds.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Transport.TransportFuzzOptions.ShouldDrop(System.Random)
member.summary: Determines whether to drop a packet based on configured probability.
member.returns: True if the packet should be dropped.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Transport.TransportFuzzOptions.ShouldDelay(System.Int32@,System.Random)
member.summary: Determines whether to delay a packet and calculates the delay duration.
member.param: Output: delay duration in milliseconds if delayed, otherwise 0.
member.returns: True if the packet should be delayed.
